Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and coat a baking sheet with grease.
Arrange the eggplant slices on the greased baking sheet and generously brush them with olive oil. Lay garlic slices on top of the eggplant.
Bake the eggplant in the preheated oven until it becomes soft and golden brown, about 15 to 20 minutes.
Combine the roasted eggplant slices and garlic with the garbanzo beans and salt in the work bowl of a food processor, then process until the mixture is smooth.
